article.title: AH-64 Apache Logistical Support Contract Extended
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: Lockheed Martin Corporation, Orlando, Florida, was awarded more than $48 million for the six-month extension of logistical support for the AH-64 Apache modernized and legacy target acquisition designation sight assembly and pilot night vision sensor assembly system.Â U.S. Army Contracting Command, Redstone Arsenal, Alabama, is the contracting activity.
